quote: Angelo,"" he said, and felt the bed rock as Angelo shuddered, caught halfway between REM atonia - the inhibition of movement caused by the shutdown of monoamines in the brain - and waking.
quote_letters: ANGELO HE SAID AND FELT THE BED ROCK AS ANGELO SHUDDERED CAUGHT HALFWAY BETWEEN REM ATONIA - THE INHIBITION OF MOVEMENT CAUSED BY THE SHUTDOWN OF MONOAMINES IN THE BRAIN - AND WAKING
